decision_conditions: Condition : 14 - The proposed food and drink use would represent an unneighbourly form of development harmful to the amenities of occupiers of adjoining residential properties, particularly the occupiers of the maisonette at 230A Merton Road SW19, resulting in noise and smell nuisance, contrary to Policies EP.2 and S.16 of the adopted Unitary Development Plan 1996.

Condition : 16 - The proposed external ductwork would be harmful to the visual amenities of the area, the appearance of the building and the garden amenity enjoyed by the occupiers of the adjoining residential property of 230A Merton Road SW19, contrary to Policies EB.18 and EB.23 of the adopted Unitary Development Plan 1996.
description: CHANGE OF USE OF GROUND FLOOR PREMISES FROM CLASS A2 (FINANCIAL AND PROFESSIONAL SERVICES) TO CLASS A3 (FOOD AND DRINK) FOR USE AS PIZZA TAKEAWAY, PLUS INSTALLATION OF EXTERNAL VENTILATION DUCTING AT REAR.
